Name: 2_unitedhealthcareinc_healthcare_medicare_insurance
Representative_Docs: ['Thinking about health insurance? UnitedHealthcare (#UnitedHealthcareInc, #UnitedHealthGroupIncorporated) offers a wide range of plans. Compare options & find the best fit for your needs! Learn more: [link to website] #UnitedHealthcareInc,Unite', 'UnitedHealthcare (UHC) offers a food benefit that provides a monthly credit to help pay for healthy food and over-the-counter (OTC) products. The credit is loaded onto a UCard, which can be used at participating stores or online.', "Looking for a Medicare plan that meets your needs and budget? I can help. I'm a licensed sales agent for UnitedHealthcare Medicare Advantage plans based in FL. Call me at 727-688-9125 , TTY 711.\n\nWe only have a fews days left of Open Enrollment. Contact me soon!"]
